title: Assurance Details Specifications
description: This object provides information about what validation has been performed on the returned payment credentials so that appropriate instrument risk checks can be applied.

account_verified.description: If true, indicates that Cardholder possession validation has been performed on returned payment credential.

card_holder_authenticated.description: If true, indicates that identification and verifications (ID&V) was performed on the returned payment credential. If false, the same risk-based authentication can be performed as you would for card transactions (e.g. 3D Secure).
